review: Because of you respond to the rating, it means you love your product. So I've to detail about it. I've used other app, but this one very strategic, effective, simple and moreover very easy to use. If you don't want a widget in your home screen, you can simply access it in the notification panel, and that's very thoughtful. Add some more features like coloured region, small popup icon reminder, different widgets. Thank you for the minimum ads.
ras4vb: Hello sajeesh,you're welcome, thank you so much for fantastic feedback, about your suggestions, I just added it on the next version of this app,its currently on beta, and it will be released soon, best regards

review: Unable to change the default alarm ringtone!! The UI of the app is neat and it seems to be able to do what it's created for. But there is a bug as I am unable to change the default ringtone as the app keeps crashing when I go to change it. Nor is there a way to switch off the alarm for normal tasks. Pls fix this so that I can rate it on the basis of its features. Thanks in advance
ras4vb: Hi rituraj, Ok, I'll check it. By the way, you can switch alarm on or off when adding the task by clicking the bell icon beside the time clock. Thanks for your feedback.

review: Love the app. One request. Please allow to sort the lists in custom drag and drop fashion. Alphabetical and date created isn't what I need most of the times. Apart from that, amazing app. If you want to monetize it at less than $2 one time fee by removing ads. That would be great. Rest all perfect
ras4vb: Hello Chitranshu, thanks so much for your valuable feedback, and I'll take your suggestions into consideration.

review: Wow! This is THE BEST one out of all (reminder app) for me. At first, it's super easy to use. Then it has all important features that are required. Thirdly, it offers flexibility and customization. The look & feel of the app is superb. Took me just a minute to know and understand all the features.
ras4vb: Hello, I'm so glad you liked my app,Thank you so much for the great feedback .

review: The widget if awesome! Specially the transparent work! Other features is also good with back up option. I don't like setting of times and ringtone. I am unable to set a multiple alarm for a single events( for day to day study reminder!) Give us a feature for strictly stick on homepage ( just like morning alarm will not going stop untill you tickmark, solve puzzle, easy maths or anything!)

After installing and uninstalling atleast 8-10 reminder apps, finally I found the perfect one! Whew! This app has everything one desires. It reminds even when the phone is locked (most other apps do not). Has all the desired features:- One tap dismissal of notifications, choosing whether to repeat the alarm or not, choosing of alarm ringtone etc.
ras4vb: Hello,really glad you liked my app, thank you for such delightful feedback, happy organizing  :)

review: This app is quite good and has a lot of the features that other similar to-do list apps require you to pay for this one's free. However I do have a few requests for them to do. The settings options is fairly limited I'd like to see it expand. Colors are allowed for various listings and whatnot however I'm unable to change the color. There are other settings I'd like the option of however I'm running out of space in this review

I found my favorite check list! I tried a lot of check list over a few days. This one is simple and gets the job done. There are ads but they are at the bottom and out of the way. There is a "quick add" button or you can put a lot more detail about an item that is entered.I like the reminders. I like that you can put specific times for items. My wish is that it could show "All Lists but Shopping" since I consider my "to dos" seperate from that my shopping. Would write more but don't have space!
ras4vb: Hello Elisabeth, I am really glad you liked my app, and I will take your note in account, thank you very much for all your wonderful words.

review: Great app. I really like how the recurring tasks feature is free. I've downloaded lots of apps trying to find one where I wouldnt need to have a monthly subscription. The repeat option was kind of hard to find at first, because I didn't set a reminder. If you don't set a reminder, you cannot repeat the task at all. Maybe I'm just tired though. It isnt a big deal. I think a "Help" page which shows you how to access features step by step would be really useful! Overall, great so far! Thanks!
ras4vb: Hello Zehra, really glad you liked my app, many thanks for great feedback, and I'll take your note on account

review: Finally, I have found my Task app!!! I have been looking for years! Very clean design. I was able to color code tasks (home, anywhere calls, and out and about), then I can search on any word such as "call". And on the left side I can select the type of task (home), then on the right side I can select the time frame due. I would like to suggest a link to a contact's phone number and address so that someone could be called or a map could be evoked from within the app. Thanks for a great app!
ras4vb:
Hello ,I'm really glad you liked my app,
 about your note I'll take it in account, 
.thanks a lot for amazing feedback

review: Glad I found this app! I use it mainly as a recurring bill pay reminder. Love that I can set a time with multiple snoozes, color code, add notes, and set a distinctive sound for each reminder. Just "discovered " the Voice option and Multiple Task reminder option, which will back up my post-it notes collection. The Quick Task is great for things that pop up during the day. The ads are a small price to pay for everything that you get with this app. Thanks!
ras4vb: Hello Tina, really glad you liked my app, thank you so much for such delightful review. Such encouraging words keep me working hard to deliver the best. Happy organizing  :)

review: The color-coordinated catagories are helpful to focus and not get overwhelmed with so many items. I haven't had success yet with the audio reminder sounds. They seem to get cut off after a chirp. Maybe there's a setting I need to change. Most of my list is set to a general "no time" or to a specific day and time with no alarm set.

This is the best reminder and ToDo app out of the many I have tried. Excellent user interface, never crashes. Highly recommended. Still using, best task manager available. Wish there was a paid mode to eliminate ads. But even with ads the best. Has check lists, syncs with Google tasks, has timer alerts colored tabs for grouping tasks. Should be renamed for more exposure to the Android market. Reset my phone and took a long time re-find and install but worth the effort.
ras4vb:
Hello Robert, really glad you liked my app, thank you so much for your great review.

Hello Robert, reading your kind words makes me working hard to deliver the best, I'm really glad you liked my app, thank you so much for such positive words and such great supporting, happy organizing :)

review: I'm getting comfortable with this now and liking it. I wanted an app with TO DO lists and obnoxious reminders. Other to-do lists or Google Calendar ding you once and if you miss that one ding, you're screwed. Unfortunately, when a reminder goes off, there is no SNOOZE or DISMISS option that pops up on your phone screen. You have to open the reminder and reset the time, reschedule it or check done. A hassle.
ras4vb: Hello Bari, you can set a task snooze, but, the full-screen reminder option has been just added in the new version of this app, it'll be released soon. Thanks a lot for your feedback.

review: Decent app. Option to change the snooze duration is nice. But I refuse to let ads run in apps. Which is why I buy them. With no ad free option. I won't be using it.you could keep the ads but allow us to pay to remove. You can even do a month/ year. Subscription. Or a larger one time payment. I do understand that development is slow. And you are probably refining the app before wanting to charge. It's a tough business. As I'm trying to release my own app. Best of luck ;)
ras4vb: Hello Xara, I'm working to add a paid version with no ads in the future, by the way, this app currently shows only small ads and doesn't show any pop-up ads. For more information about this app ads, please refere to the app privacy policy you can access it from the app settings under "about us" section. Thanks for your kind feedback.

review: I had to do a complete reset of my phone. I have an older Android. So idk if this is why but because I couldn't find my old reminder app, I tried others. None worked or were what I needed. Due to a condition I have, I sometimes have memory issues. So I need a reliable app for my medication reminders. This one has been exactly what I want! It has worked perfectly from the start. And it's only been 2 days. The ones I tried didn't have a snooze. And this does. So thank you for a great app!
ras4vb: Hello Melanie, you are welcome. Really glad you liked my app, thank you so much for your great support. Happy organizing :)

review: I like the features of choosing my own notification sounds for each reminder to customize it, like choosing the category and color customization, like I can repeat reminders, the ease of starting to use it without endless permissions, and the ease of setting new reminders. HOWEVER, I don't like that it doesn't pop up to SHOW the reminder, and you have to go into the app to choose done, THEN be careful to choose keep repeating-cumbersome üòí. If you can change this I can give 5 stars.
ras4vb: Hello Kelly ,pop up reminder feature has been added on the new version of this app,it's now on beta and it'll be released soon,thanks a lot for such delightful feedback,and don‚Äôt hesitate to shoot us a note at tact.techno@gmail.com if you have any question.

review: I switched from iPhone to Android and was looking for a good alternative to my fav reminder app, Alarmed. After much trial and error this came closest to what I was looking for, such as easy and clean interface (no fanciful colors/fonts) as well as ability to customize scheduled repeats (eg only Mon or Wed every week) and add notes. Nevertheless, there are improvements that I yearn for. Checkbox for "Done" is too small and easy to click wrongly, and postpone tasks function will be great!
ras4vb: Hello Mollie,I'm really glad you liked my app,thanks a lot for great feedback,and I will take your notes in account,best regards.

review: Love the ability to color coordinate and make separate lists but still see them all in chronological order. It's everything I'm looking for to keep me organized, has alarms and repeat capabilities. I only wish the widget had the checkboxes in the actual widget instead of me having to open the app to check it off my list. Overall very pleased!
ras4vb:
Hello,glad you liked this app ,
about your note i will take in account in future releases, 
Many thanks for the great rating.

review: Particularly like the repeat option which sets a repeat task when clicked as done. Alarm repeats also good as is the layout and colour options of the tasks. In fact love almost everything... but don't like the ads; though they aren't too intrusive, someflash different texts which is a bit off putting. I look forward to a paid (no ads) version.
ras4vb: Hello Adrian, thank you so much for such delightful review. I'll add a paid version with no ads on future release.by the way app currently shows only small ads at screen bottom and doesn't show any pop-up ads .for more information about ads please read this app privacy policy you can access it from app settings under about us section.

review: I love this app! Especially the fact that I can add it to my do not disturb permissions and it will still go off. Others that I have added do not go off. The only problem I'm having is occasionally one of my repeating tasks just disappears and I have to add it again. It doesn't happen a lot but it is annoying. Great job overall though.
ras4vb:
Hello Laurel,check battery optimization settings from your phone settings,make sure it's off for this app,and the "automatic management for ALL" option is set to no,alarming has been improved on the new version of this app.
I'll check repeat issue,Thanks a lot for such delightful feedback. It really helps us to keep going and delivering the best :)

review: This is the best app I've found to act as a reminder of tasks that are due. I originally gave this app just 3 stars because I was unhappy that it forced me to hit the repeat button rather than the done button when completing a repeating task in order to make it continue repeating. With small fonts, poor eyesight and fat fingers, bumping the wrong button deleted my task completely. However, the developer responded to my review and pointed out that I could change that behavior in the app settings. A developer that cares and an app that gets the job done. I'm now giving the app 5 stars. In this and all apps, it would be most helpful to have easily distinguishable icons instead of tiny print to identify buttons for those of us who need to find and put on reading glasses in order to press the correct button.
ras4vb: Hello Chuck, thanks so much for the awesome feedback it's much appreciated. About your note, you can disable  the "confirme repeat" option from the app settings, and then the task will be repeated when click done without showing the confirmation dialog. Thanks again

review: This app is great! It's smooth and have the features I'm looking for. Well, except for one thing though... About the widget, can you add a functionality where you can just check a task off just in the widget without opening it in the main app? In that way, it wouldn't be a hassle to tick off multiple tasks... Edit: It would also be great if there's a a priority feature for the tasks.

Simple, well-designed and efficient app that does its job without flooding your phone with 30s horrendously annoying video ads every time you finish a task. It also says in the description of the app that it does have small ads, which I appreciated for its honesty. Just for this, I'll be happy to pay for a pro version when one is released.
ras4vb: Hello Jo√£o, I'm working to add a paid version with no ads on the coming version of this app. thank you so much for your encouraging words, such delightful review keeps me working hard to deliver the best. Happy organizing :)

review: I'm a list maker, but being visually impaired, I'm always losing my lists. This has times, repeats, alarms, different categories you can make, and more. This has been the first list that works for me, and I'm staying on track even during my busy time.
ras4vb: Hello Libby, really glad you liked my app, thank you so much for such delightful review, happy organizing:)

review: Set up a couple of reminders with alarm and none of them actually worked. Found notifications for them in the phone notification bar as overdue a good few days after they were due. Not exactly what I was expecting. Update. I have done as requested by the developer but the alarm still didn't go off which means that I have missed one of my deadlines. I don't think there is a reason for me to retain this app.
ras4vb: Hello davide, set the battery optimization setting for this to off from your phone settings, also you can adjust the alarm settings from the app settings, and I'm working to improve that in the future release of this app. Thank you.

review: It repeatedly stops sounding alarms for tasks but has them marked as overdue, as if the alarm went through. So far, only uninstalling & reinstalling it has fixed it, which is super inconvenient because the tasks do not back up so I have to rewrite ALL of them... Otherwise, this would be the perfect app for me. Oh, well.

Looks beautiful, set up in a great usable format for a personal to-do list...unfortunately, it doesn't work. Entries move dates, disappear or un-delete themselves. The repeat option is deleted or changes days, without my input. Entries duplicate themselves with changes (different days, no repeat). Too bad, it has great potential. Uninstalling.
ras4vb:
.Hello Nadine,apologize my app wasn't for you,
by the way maybe that miss happend because syncing with google tasks, I will check it, thank you ,

review: After downloading and deleting 8 apps, I settled down for this. A straightforward app, you can make lists of to_do entering time and date. You may not enter sequentially, it gets arranged. You can input on any date It then gives you a sound/ ringtone notification.at the time and date. Its excellent,all the others i have tried were a bunch of rubbish. Have been looking like this for a long time
ras4vb: Hello Tanbirul, glad you like it, many thanks for your awesome feedback, it's much appreciated. Happy organizing :)

review: Very Good experience so far. The biggest standout feature is ALARM. Which Makes it different from other Apps and the choice wether to add reminders if necessary or just leave it as a note, plus easy to access just have to scroll down your notification bar, don't have to search for app or widget

Looks very good and capable for the simple task I need it to. Looks abandoned but I'd wish to make a suggestion. The LED notification doesn't work well with my phone. I guess it's because of the non-'standard' LED color which causes problems with my one-color LED. Is it possible to add an option to change the LED color? To pure red/blue/green etc. There should be a way to remove ads. Also exiting the app requires two taps on the Back button, why? Please add option for single tap to exit.
ras4vb: Hello Teodor,I'll add a paid version with no ads on future release, by the way app,currently shows only small ad at screen bottom and doesn't show any pop up ads,the other notes has been just added on the new version, it's now on beta and it'll be released soon, for more you can use the feedback option from app settings to send me a feedback,thanks

review: Testing worked fine. Today the reminders did not remind me. No sound no pop-up. Nothing. I need it to make a sound. Not just say overdue in the app. Edit: Some reminders work sporadically after the instructions below. But I snooze one reminder for a different time than the original option and it changed the snooze option for every reminder.
ras4vb: Hi, I'll check it, thanks for letting me know.

review: Excellent application. Two suggestions. First, add feature of dragging manually tasks up or down. Second, add feature of speaking the task in speech. Thus the user can choose from Settings: Reminder will have only sound or reminder will have sound together with speaking the task or reminder will speak the task with no sound.
ras4vb: Hello Andon, thanks a lot for your valuable feedback, it's much appreciated, and I'll take your suggestions into consideration

review: I loved it. It helps me keep organized. But, I did notice that some alarms don't play. Please fix that. On the other hand, this app is best!!!! üëçüëèüëèüëè Keep up the work!! It's convenient, precise and easy to use. Highly recommended!!!!!!

I love the box type reminders It's a very useful app to check ur to do list on the go Recommend it to one and all... Only one request when the buzzer is activated it shud be easily visible to turn it off like the regular alarm, that's a little difficult but the rest is supreme

This app is almost perfect some disappointing parts are when we are working with our device and a reminder comes up a notification with no name!!! Shows and I don't know what was that!!! And another important thing it does not sort by nearest due time to latest, another suggestion is reminder by specefic location and the ability to attach files I appreciate if you consider them in the next version.
ras4vb: Hello Mohsen, I'll consider your notes and suggestions in the next version of this app, thanks a lot for your great help, I appreciate it.

review: Wonderful app! Just what I was looking for. It's robust enough to get things done, without any complications. Integration with Google Tasks a definite plus. There's just one issue. ‚Å£ Could you please add a sorting function? I find that when synchronizing with Google Tasks the "subtasks" transfer out of order, voiding the app's "subtask" function. THANK YOU!

I love it But it needs a way to turn off the whole list. I set up multiple lists for different seasons when I use an app like this one so I need to turn off the winter list/schedule and turn on the spring one soon. Ps -I'm switching to this instead of TimeTune because their latest update killed it for offline use so now it sucks. This Simple Plan to do app is way better.
ras4vb: Hello, I'll add your suggestion on future release, thank you so much for your kind feedback

review: Great for quick ideas I get/to-do's /tips from others! I just pull down the notifications, speak, and click my tab! I did tabs like..red, yellow and green for slow/med/fast todos. one called tips. One w lightbulb icon. I get so much done!! Wow! Smooth intuitive clean UI. Hubby's a dev- you worked so hard! This is beautiful! Thanks! I'll tell others!

I have been searching for quite a lot of countdown apps. They are all standalone. Kind of defeating the purpose as I rely heavily on Google calendar. This is the only app that allow me to sync to Google calender. My problem solved. It also allow setting of dark mode. Just what I need. I don't mind paying for a paid version for a job well done...
ras4vb: Hi Wyko, thanks for the nice feedback, and I'm working to add a paid version without ads in a future release of this app. By the way, this app currently shows only small ads at screen bottom and doesn't show any pop-up ads for more information about ads please refer to the app privacy policy, you can access it from app settings. Happy organizing :)
